import React from 'react' import './UserProfileModal.css' function UserProfileModal({userItems}) { const [formState, setFormState]=useState({ full_name: "", location: "", bio: "", image: "" }) //This function is setting state and adding in the user input values const handleChange = (e) => { setFormState({...formState, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return ( <>




) } export default UserProfileModal
